# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(misja008_drone_io)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../cmake-build-Release/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Release")

# Projects


# Top project
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_misja008_drone_io_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/..")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .
    ./lib/SFML-2.4.2/include

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-O3)
add_definitions(-std=c++14)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(
    -DNDEBUG
)


# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. -L./lib/SFML-2.4.2/lib ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/main.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/IOPacket.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -O3 -std=c++14 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(misja008_drone_io ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(misja008_drone_io ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(misja008_drone_io
    sfml-graphics
    sfml-window
    sfml-system
    sfml-network
)


# Adding POST_BUILD commands
add_custom_command(
    TARGET misja008_drone_io
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND copy .\\lib\\SFML-2.4.2\\bin\\* .\\Release)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET misja008_drone_io
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND copy .\\res\\* .\\Release)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET misja008_drone_io
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND if not exist .\\Release\\cache mkdir .\\Release\\cache)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET misja008_drone_io
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND if not exist .\\Release\\screen mkdir .\\Release\\screen)



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
